title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 601 - Water Withdrawal Permiting, Reporting And Registration (exclusive Of Long Island Wells Regulated Under Part 602 Of This Title)
content:

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
